title: iFoneMate - The Ultimate iOS Device Data Recovery Whiz
text: iFoneMate - The Ultimate iOS Device Data Recovery Whiz , 16 October 2015 -- iFoneMate, the latest and the most reliable data recovery for iPhone software and iPad users is now available in the market and ready to take the world by a storm.iFoneMate, the latest and the most reliable data recovery for iPhone software and iPad users is now available in the market and ready to take the world by a storm. This latest software which is compatible with all iOS devices will enable users to recover at least 12 types of lost data media or text files easily using Windows and/or Mac platforms, for free. iFoneMate will enable all iOS users to recover 12 different types of media and text data files like pictures, notes, text messages, call logs, WhatsApp data, contacts and various attachments. The software will also allow users to recover specific lost data as they will be able to preview the details of each data before they can begin the process of recovery, thus saving time and hassle of having to restore the entire deviceâ€™s data. iFoneMate has a very simple operation and the whole process of downloading the software, installing it and using it to recover lost iPhone data is very easy. Users will be able to recover their lost data through three modes either from the iOS device directly, from iTunes backup files and also through iCloud backup files. Through latest integration of technology, users will also be able to recover their data in less than three simple clicks without any technical knowledge. iFoneMate is the finest software to date that has been designed specifically to help Apple device users recover their lost data without bringing any secondary damage to the device. iFoneMate is available for free download as well as free upgrade on Windows and Mac which confirms the availability of the software for the entire lifetime.
